DEFAULT_TIP.title: Health and Wellness Tips
DEFAULT_TIP.message: Take deep breaths. Inhale deep, hold breath for 3 seconds, Exhale. Pause for 3 seconds. Repeat 6-10 times, preferably with your eyes closed.

DEFAULT_TIP.title: Daily Peace Tip
DEFAULT_TIP.subtitle: Today's tip
DEFAULT_TIP.message: Take a moment to pause and reflect. Find a quiet space, close your eyes, and focus on your breath for a few minutes.
